name: Lost Lives (Pauline Garling, KyokoKiki, FelixHaufe7)
description:
In LostLives you watch a streamer who chases rumors with his friends about various Lost Places. As a chatter you interact with the stream and help the streamer to uncover the truth behind the rumors and discover a secret or two.

What to expect:

  • beautiful drawings
  • Special character design
  • Multiple answer options
  • achievements

The Team that made the Game:
